entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
